content: The app has completely stopped working on a MotoG 6 phone and Android 8. It was working on a G4 and Android 7, but no more. Please fix. BTW, I know how to set and use the app as I was using it for long before changing the phones.
replyContent: Can you share some details on what you're seeing? Please email me via the app so I get your settings, and you can also send me the log via the menu. kevinersoy@kevinersoy.com

content: Thanks for the response to my earlier review Kevin, I followed your advice and everything was fine until about a week ago. I now find that the Youblue service appears to be stopping randomly and requires a manual restart. Despite that it's still an easy 5üåü for me as it does exactly what I wanted it to do.
replyContent: There are a couple things that could be going on.  Phone could be going into doze mode, or the system could be shutting down the service.  Try marking it unmonitored in your battery settings.  Email me if you still have trouble kevinersoy@kevinersoy.com
